thread.title: Florida Subaru Legacy Outback Owner
thread.title_full: Brake Performance reviewed by Florida Subaru Legacy Outback Owner

author: Florida Subaru Legacy Outback Owner
title: Florida Subaru Legacy Outback Owner
text: I have a 1997 Subaru Legacy Outback with 190,000 miles. Brakes have never been changed - rear brakes were broken/missing and front brakes wore down to paper thin. (I am 2nd owner - just purchased). I went to Brake Performance website and found exact match for new rotors and brakes. Ordered and package arrived in a VERY timely manner - exactly as I had ordered. I am totally pleased with the outcome not to mention the fact that now I have brakes again !
